section.title: Compatible Java Developer Kits
section.para: JBoss Developer Studio 7 requires a Java developer kit of version 1.6 at a minimum. This release of JBoss Developer Studio is supported on the operating system and Java developer kit combinations listed in the table below. Although Oracle JDK 1.7 is available for OS X operating systems, this combination is incompatible with JBoss Developer Studio.

table.title: Supported Combinations of Operating Systems and Java Developer Kits

row.entry:
OpenJDK 1.6, OpenJDK 1.7,
[QE]Oracle JDK 1.6 and Oracle JDK 1.7
OS X Lion (10.7) and OS X Mountain Lion (10.8)

section.para: Before installing JBoss Developer Studio you should check which Java developer kit you have installed. If it is not listed above, you must install a compatible one before proceeding.

important.para: You must use a 32-bit Java developer kit to install a 32-bit version of JBoss Developer Studio and a 64-bit Java developer kit to install a 64-bit version of JBoss Developer Studio.
